title: Unable to open PDFs
content:
Hello,

Suddenly no PDFs will open when I click on them.
creator: mail1214

title: FF93 incredibly slow on each initial page load
content:
As above. I don't really keep track of versions but it's at v93 right now and only this week started to perform extremely slowly with regards to the initial loading of ~90% of the pages I visit, even cached and frequented sites. Once past that it performs as normal. Speedtesting is fine but Browserbench results are horrendous. (This is my first time running this test so I don't have a previous FF result to compare with.)

FF93: 59.497 Chrome95: 119.820 Edge95: 117.970

https://imgur.com/a/qw3CWI0

Already tried: clearing site data and cache, incognito, safe mode, and of course cutting addons to a minimum.

Currently installed: AdBlock Plus Dark Reader Don't Accept image/webp Facebook Container ffCK Overlays uBlock Origin View Image Ressurected YouTube NonStop

Can someone advise what else can be done or what is going on please? I've been faithful to FF for over a decade and have all my bookmarks, history and credentials saved to this account. However if this is going to be the user experience moving forward - then all I can say is I will not be joining the declining Firefox user base. W10, i5-9400f, 32GB ram, wired CAT6 + 1Gbit Fibre.
creator: nicky9499

title: All types of media - videos or audios stopped playing on Firefox since a few weeks
content:
All types of media - videos or audios stopped playing on Firefox since a few weeks. The page opens but the after clicking play button it keeps on loading. As per online articles, I disabled all extensions, unticked hardware acceleration etc but nothing has helped so far.

I'm at a point where I will stop using this browser altogether.
creator: ajnagane

title: No options menu in extension manager and no icons in toolbar (Zorin OS Lite)
content: I'm using Firefox 93.0 on Zorin OS Lite 15.3 32 bit. There are no options menu available in the extensions manager. Ublock origin and Enhancer for Youtube. All extensions icons doesn't show up too in the toolbar so I can't manage them. No problem in Windows 7 and Windows 10.
creator: deedhoet

title: Pin to Taskbar
content: I can pin Firefox to my Taskbar and used to be able to pin shortcuts to that but all of a sudden I cannot pin shortcuts to that Firefox that it is sitting on the Taskbar. I drag them to the Firefox shortcut on the Taskbar and a message pops up “Pin to Firefox?” but when I right click on the Taskbar Firefox link there are only the original shortcuts that were there before this problem began. I have tried Uninstall & Reinstall but nothing works.
creator: fredgough

title: Trouble with TV5MONDEplus.com
content: French expat in Asia I noticed that since the launch of this free website, Firefox 93.0 running with macOS Big Sur 11.6 is unable to connect properly with the French TV5MONDEplus website. Access to the site is entirely possible but the connection seems to stop as soon as you try to view the programs offered… This problem doesn't arise by using Chrome.
creator: cldjr1

title: Is memory cache a vulnerability of disclosure of sensitive information?
content: According to FAQ of Caching Mechanism (mozilla.org), it is by design to cache “documents specifically marked for "not caching" through-- "Pragma: no-cache" or a "Cache-control:" directive specified as an HTTP response header” in memory to improve performance. So, it is possible for you to view sensitive information from the Firefox memory cache after you log out an web application and keep Firefox open.
creator: yong-liang.liu

title: I'm leaving Firefox.  Disgusted with using this browser.
content: I am constantly unable to access websites. My data seems to clog up. I'm in my 70's and have no patience or training for sifting though numerous fixes and possible solutions. I've done my best with no improvement. My husband is having the same issues on his computer. All my previous efforts erase my sign ins and require me to constantly enter new sign in information for my common websites. I can use Safari and Chrome without these issues so unless I get some form of personalized help that doesn't require a great deal of technological skill, I'm leaving this browser greatly disappointed in the lack of support.
creator: bonnygal2
